title: 找人帮忙配置权限组
author: 放棄治療♡
txt_content: 有人愿意帮忙 配置一下权限组吗是个生存+rpg端 有的话请联系qq:3301541653

replies.author: MyKtw
replies.txt_content:
根据楼主的要求在GroupManager插件配置文件内添加了基础权限如下
    - bsteams.use
    - CreeperMarriage.use
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.warp
    - chenghao.open
    - chenghao.mb
    - plots.use
